title: [K-12] Pre-Service Teachers' Critical Thinking Skills Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge of pedagogy and basic instructional skills
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment integrating online discussions, hands-on activities, and feedback sessions.

learning_goals: Prospective teachers can perform logical analysis of diverse educational case studies
Preservice teachers can assess the critical thinking level of learners' questions by utilizing scaffolding strategies.
Preservice teachers can improve their instructional design approaches through peer feedback and self-reflection.
Preservice teachers can lead collaborative problem-solving activities in online learning communities.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
